item.title: New Plugin Engine
item.description: Installing a plugin Plugin model is based on Caddy plugins system, they must be compiled within the project just by importing them like this: import( "github.com/jptosso/coraza-waf" _ "github.com/someone/somecorazaplugin" ) Important: Some integrations like Traefik does not support plugins, because we cannot control how the integration is compiled by Pilot. Plugins capabilities Plugins now support: Rule Operators: Create rul operators like @even to detect even numbers Rule Transformations: Create rule transformations like t:rot13 to encode your values in ROT13 Rule Actions: Create rule actions like challenge to redirect a malicious request to some bot detection system Plugins will support in the near future:
